section.p: This template represents measurement of common vital signs. Vital signs are represented with additional vocabulary constraints for type of vital sign and unit of measure.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7299, CONF:1098-10527, CONF:1098-32574 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Vital Sign Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-7304)
null
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:1098-7305)
contain zero or one [0..1] text

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] interpretationCode (CONF:1098-7307), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Observation Interpretation (HL7) DYNAMIC 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.78 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32886, DSTU:1220)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-7310)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

contain [0..1] author such that it
Conforms to Author from CDA
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Vital Sign Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7297, R2.0=CONF:1098-7297)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7298, R2.0=CONF:1098-7298)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Vital Sign ID) (CONF:7300, R2.0=CONF:1098-7300)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (Vital Sign Type), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet HITSP Vital Sign Result Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.62 DYNAMIC (CONF:7301, R2.0=CONF:1098-7301)
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.0=CONF:1098-7303)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7303, R2.0=CONF:1098-19119)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-7304)
null
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:1098-7305)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] interpretationCode (CONF:1098-7307), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Observation Interpretation (HL7) DYNAMIC 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.78 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32886, DSTU:1220)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7308, R2.0=CONF:1098-7308)
The method code element may be present to indicate the method used to obtain the measure. Note that method used is distinct from, but possibly related to the target site.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:7309, R2.0=CONF:1098-7309)
The target site of the measure may be identified in the targetSiteCode element (e.g., Left arm [blood pressure], oral [temperature], et cetera).

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-7310)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15943)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15944)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15945)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2147207392"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <interpretationCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" codeSystemName="ObservationInterpretation"/> <methodCode code="993469726"/> <targetSiteCode code="539580520"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="839261540"/> <code code="910527729"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <author/> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( (CONF:7299, CONF:10527 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27"
Consol Vital Sign Observation text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15943)
Consol Vital Sign Observation reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15944)
Consol Vital Sign Observation reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15945)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Vital Sign Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7297, R2.0=CONF:1098-7297)
Consol Vital Sign Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7298, R2.0=CONF:1098-7298)
Consol Vital Sign Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Vital Sign ID) (CONF:7300, R2.0=CONF:1098-7300)

Consol Vital Sign Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (Vital Sign Type), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet HITSP Vital Sign Result Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.62 DYNAMIC (CONF:7301, R2.0=CONF:1098-7301)
Consol Vital Sign Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.0=CONF:1098-7303)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7303, R2.0=CONF:1098-19119)
Consol Vital Sign Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (Vital Sign Date/Time) (CONF:7304)
Consol Vital Sign Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (Vital Sign Value) with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:7305)
Consol Vital Sign Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] interpretationCode (Vital Sign Interpretation) (CONF:7307)
Consol Vital Sign Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:7308, R2.0=CONF:1098-7308)
Consol Vital Sign Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:7309, R2.0=CONF:1098-7309)
Consol Vital Sign Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7302)
Consol Vital Sign Observation MAY contain [0..1] author such that it (CONF:7310) Conforms to Author from CDA
